1: @@//pa gang yin <mistake>dang//thig</mistake> le <mistake>au</mistake> yig dang ldan pa'i//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te//rta mchog rgyal po chen po yis//thams cad dus su <mistake>bzlab</mistake> bar <mistake>bya //las</mistake> rnams
2: thams cad 'grub pa ni//'joms pa las grub dran las dga'//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//o yig thig le dang ldan par//de bzhin dbus
3: las dbu ma <mistake>pa//sgrayig</mistake> i dang <mistake>byor</mistake> bar bya//dbang ldan phyi rol de bzhin te//dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin <mistake>te //me</mistake> mtshams pa yi stan <mistake>dan</mistake> <mistake>pa'i//to</mistake>
4: las dbu ma yang yin te//byang las bzhi pa gang yin <mistake>dang//me</mistake> mtshams pa <mistake>yin</mistake> mnyam gnon <mistake>pa'ig//dbus</mistake> las <mistake>tham</mistake> 'gyur ldan <mistake>bya/lho</mistake> las dbu ma yang yin <mistake>te/tshog</mistake> drag <mistake>ar yig</mistake>
5: <mistake>t/ldan</mistake> pa ni//sna tshogs <mistake>pad mo</mistake> zhes su grags//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//o yig <mistake>thag</mistake> le dang ldan <mistake>par// yig</mistake> dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i//
6: <mistake>/ dbus</mistake> las dbu ma yang yin te//dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas//dbus <mistake>la</mistake> dbu ma ldan par bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te//me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i//lho las dbu ma
7: 'gyur bar <mistake>bya// bden</mistake> <mistake>kral</mistake> phyi rol bzung ba <mistake>dang//dbus</mistake> las dbu ma ldan pa <mistake>yi / /byang</mistake> las dang po 'gyur bar bya//tsheg drag dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa yang yin//
8: <mistake>/rta</mistake> yi rgyal <mistake>po</mistake> dkyil 'khor <mistake>la//sng</mistake> tshogs rdo rje zhes grags so//gang dang gang gi dbus la ni//rta mchog 'di ni <mistake>bzhag</mistake> bya na//de nyid <mistake>de'i</mistake> <mistake>dkil</mistake> 'khor yin//yul <mistake>'khoar</mistake> thams cad 'dul
